title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Feb 5 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Feb 5 2022
description:
C&B break down the Brian Flores lawsuit against the NFL. Buck says, "I'm never watching the NFL again... I sit here and I see a lot of overpaid people who are ungrateful to the country that supports them." Clay is a die-hard sports fan who notes he loves how sports means races and genders "can all pursue excellence by a common set of rules." The NFLPA's George Martin outrageously compares Flores to Rosa Parks. ABC suspends Whoopi Goldberg for two weeks for uninformed Holocaust comments. Goldberg views race through the liberal lens of American identity politics, ignorant of world history. Zucker out at CNN. More on Goldberg and Flores.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck
